'''Mallow Wood "Multi-Model" Wardrobe''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Mallow Wood "Multi-Model" Wardrobe is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Mallow Wood = 10
|Fabric = 2
|sort = Mallow Wood;Fabric
}}
